column1: A pound sign (#) denotes any cohort/subcohort with fewer than ten students.
This information is provided for the Student Right-to-Know Act, Public Law 101-542. It provides a partial description of the graduation and enrollment patterns of students.
It should not be used to infer or predict individual behavior.
